name: Ultrazort's Last Stand
description:
Submission for Global Game Jam 2020

Controls:

Gamepad: Left Stick to move. lower face button to jump, left face button to attack

P1: AD to move W to jump SPACE to repair

P2: JL to move I to jump ENTER to repair

Credits: 

Created by Lisandro Lorea

Music by Ale Silva Diez

Thanks to:

  • Andress Passicot for help with gameplay-related mathematical functions
  • Francisco Delledone for help with splitscreen view.
  • Esteban Borgogno for help in defining some gameplay params
